exampledata Package¶

create_example_data Module¶

WORC.exampledata.create_example_data.create_random_features(n_objects=7, n_features=10)[source]¶

Create n_objects sets of random features and save in files. Format based on PREDICT python package.

WORC.exampledata.create_example_data.create_random_imageandmask(size=512, slices=20)[source]¶
